name: Plankton community in WP2 net (200Âµm), DYFAMED point, Ligurian Sea, France
description: This series is part of the long term planktonic monitoring of Villefranche-sur-mer, which is one of the oldest and richest in the world. It aims at describing the dynamics of the mesozooplankton community. The data collection and processing has been funded by several projects over its lifetime. It is currentlysupported directly by the Institut de la Mer de Villefranche(IMEV), as part of itslong term monitoring effort, and by the MOOSE program of the Research Infrastructure ILICO. This dataset contains the planktonicorganisms collected by a WP2net (200Î¼m mesh) and therefore coverorganisms from 200Âµm to~2cm.
